titles.title: FinCEN–SBA Coordination on Beneficial Ownership Registration Act
FinCEN–SBA Coordination on Beneficial Ownership Registration Act

To require the Director of the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network and the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to enter into a memorandum of understanding to ensure the dissemination of covered information, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
